description: Aurora Stefany Goldstone is a 20-year-old anthropomorphic canine studying ocean biology.  She's shy but friendly, passionate about her studies and close to her roommate Stella.  Aurora enjoys cozy evenings, reading, and running, and dreams of discovering a new deep-sea species to honor her late grandfather.
stateReason: Contains borderline illegal content due to the mention of underage drinking and a past sexual encounter with a minor.
